channel.title: Compiling problem
channel.description:
I dont know the prob is with compiling
I open client file in wordpad i make some changes like you get 999 xp for killing goblin
then i save it , en then open that compile.bat ... but i dont do anything when i open the server the changes arent done still same game play , same names ...
i think the prob is that i dont have this file : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe
when i go to C:\Program Files\Java then i only have this file end not more -> jre1.5.0_12 <-

item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

I dont know the prob is with compiling

I open client file in wordpad i make some changes like you get 999 xp for killing goblin

then i save it , en then open that compile.bat … but i dont do anything
when i open the server the changes arent done still same game play , same names …

i think the prob is that i dont have this file :
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe
